name: Downlink: Prologue
description:
[DESCRIPTION]

A mere product of remote control technology gone further than it ever should have, you have no name, no memories, no record and only one goal. Quickly and efficiently wipe out the competition of whichever conglomerate hired you and await further orders. Do as you are told and you will have a bright future in this company, we will be watching you. And remember, DON'T STOP MOVING.

[CONTROLS]
  • WASD to move
  • Shift to sprint
  • E to interact
  • Left click to shoot
[CREDITS]
  • Animation: Mixamo
  • Models: Unity Asset Store and TurboSquid
  • Textures: Texture Haven
  • Sounds: FreeSound
  • Music by Sebastian Siverand
    • Bandcamp
    • Soundcloud
    • Twitter
  • Everything else was done by me
